entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 5:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 0.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: S 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
